item.title: NixOS & Nix Flakes - A Guide for Beginners
item.description: Since the article is so long now, for the convenience of readers, the content of this post has been moved to a separate site: Document Site: https://nixos-and-flakes.thiscute.world/ GitHub Repo: https://github.com/ryan4yin/nixos-and-flakes-book Thanks for the feedback, criticism, suggestions fromReddit❤️
